text: Hairibasing asida nattana, eigi Ibungo Christta Jisubu khangba asina asukki matik thoina henna mamal leibagi maramna pot pumnamakpu amangba oina singthanare. Maramdi Ibungogidamak eina pot pumnamakpu hundokle; amasung makhoi pumnamakpu eina phatta-haodi oina singthanare, madu eina Christtabu phangjaba yananaba,
